import { useState } from 'react'; import Data from '../data/loginCredentials.json' import pic from '../images/logoLoginPage.jpg' export default function LoginPage(){ var [emailId,setEmailId]=useState("") var [password,setPassword]=useState("") function emailFunction(e){ setEmailId(e.target.value) } function passwordFunction(e){ setPassword(e.target.value) } if((emailId=="prabhanjanreddygajjal@gmail.com")&&(password=="Prabha@123")) { document.write("Login Successful") } return( <>
); }
